wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Jon Yelloly (born 3 December 1990 in Stafford, England) is a British professional racing driver, and BMW Motorsport works driver. He is also currently a test and simulator driver for the Aston Martin F1 team.

response: *Nick Yelloly (born 1990 in Stafford) auto racing driverDriverDB.com website, Nick Yelloly  Retrieved 27 January 2018.
|  Nick Catsburg Alexander Sims Nick Yelloly

For 2012 Comtec Signed Nick Yelloly and Vittorio Ghirelli. Nick scored 2 wins for the team on his way to a creditable 5th-place finish overall in the championship. Vittorio endured a long learning curve but showed improvement with good drives  ending with 5 points for the season.
